Title: SAP Licences - for VEAT notification purposes only
Description:
This is not a new opportunity, but a VEAT notification to inform the market that the Council is looking to contract for SAP Enterprise Licences Support and Maintenance to give them rights to product updgrades, new product functionalitites, fixes, patches directly with SAP UK Ltd for a period of 2 years with 2 x 12 month extension periods. The Council is still developing SAP and so requires access to all updates.
The contract is not to procure a new system or solution, it is purely to cover the existing perpetual licences with ongoing support/maintenance across the entire stack and usage rights to SAP Solution Manager. 
Please note that the operational support contract is not included in this notice. This contract was tendered via an open process and on expiry the Council will conduct a further open transparent procurement process.

Title: National Data Architecture (NDA) - Data Modelling
Description:
This requirement is for the ability to use SAP Health's software - called Powerdesigner, to allow the NDA programme to progress with Beta stage work. 
Powerdesigner is a leader in Data Modelling space, providing conceptual, logical and physical data models. NHS Digital have a complex heterogenous data landscape and we need a tool that can 'make sense' of the data at rest (data models).
The tool is used to provide:
•	Illustrative and textual representations of conceptual, logical and physical data models in the form of normalised ERD's via ERwin for e.g. or Graph, Triple Store, Key Value etc model representations 
•	Linking of models and meta data attributes and referenced modules/DDB's etc.
•	Cardinality, relationships and constraints between entities & data attributes including keys, uniqueness, references, checks
•	Relationships of information assets (assets), data attributes which create modules, DDB's or collections (entities)
•	Catalogue of models, modules, entities, data attribute groups linked, possibly related etc but re-useable
•	Information about why, how and what entities and data attributes are associated, referenced, linked etc to create modules, DDB's etc
•	Analytical models etc based upon data models of entities, data attributes
The justification, for a single tender action, is that a contract could not be awarded following a procurement in 2017 and that a proof of concept in early 2018 demonstrated that further exploratory work should be conducted before a full requirement can be drafted, allowing for a competitive procurement to be conducted. This Tooling product has unique technical attributes to enable Beta work to be conducted. A Prior Information Notice was published in December 2018 (PIN ref: 2018/S 239-545971) to allow this requirement to be openly competed for any future contract award.
